TopicTitle: Will the second space centre still be there?

Articles.Content: Maybe left with old style graphics as a memorial?

My answer: Pretty sure it will, I don't see why not.

The real answer: no one excepted the developers and maybe those who had an early access to the game can really know.

I have been corrected, if you choose to see my error please look two posts down.

Edited July 19, 2013 by AfailingHORSE
I hope they'll leave it there the way it is now.

wasnt the second KSC a left over from early that devs left in due to popular demand?

If thats correct, then the second KSC should still be there

No, KSC2 is not there due to popular demand; it is an Easter Egg. It was added in version 0.15 when they re-did Kerbin to look like it did up to 0.17. (It was reachable by the then-new space planes and their extremely efficient engines).

Hope this helps,

Happy Flying!
